projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict heart disease using patient health data. Implemented data preprocessing, feature selection, and various classification algorithms to improve prediction accuracy.

projects.title: YouTube Data Analysis
projects.description: Created a script to collect and analyze YouTube video metadata such as views, likes, and comments using the YouTube Data API. Performed data visualization and trend analysis.

projects.title: Esports Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Implemented NLP techniques to analyze sentiment in live esports chat messages. Used BERT-based models for sentiment classification and topic modeling.

projects.title: Blockchain-Based Transparent System for PHQ
projects.description: Designed a blockchain-based system to ensure transparency and accountability within Bangladesh Police Headquarters (PHQ). Utilized smart contracts to automate data verification.
